channel.title: Favorite snack/food atm
channel.description:
Hi there!
Have you just discovered/rediscovered an awesome snack or food?
If so, we need your help! Post here with your chosen product, and a brief story of how you became united.
[hr]
I'll start:
Found these delicious freshly baked rolls at a bakery near me. They's absolutely [b]fabulous[/b] with butter and (raspberry jam or strawberry jam)!
[img]http://i.imgur.com/pp9CY.jpg[/img]

item.title: Favorite snack/food atm
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:3, topic:441353”]

Our eyes first met at the local grocery store. It was mid-morning and low on money, scouring the shelves for a tasty, warm and filling luncheon. 60c per packet seemed too good to be true, yet the necessary drink to return home with forced me to pick the cheapest option.

I’ll never forget that fateful morning. We still remain close to this very day, and my pantry is always stocked.[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite snack/food atm
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

[quote=“Phaze One, post:3, topic:441353”]

Our eyes first met at the local grocery store. It was mid-morning and low on money, scouring the shelves for a tasty, warm and filling luncheon. 60c per packet seemed too good to be true, yet the necessary drink to return home with forced me to pick the cheapest option.

I’ll never forget that fateful morning. We still remain close to this very day, and my pantry is always stocked.[/quote]
Ofc
Australian wif shrimp.

Well anyways not sure if they have them anywhere else, but they’re green plums (Not ready red plums, I guess?) so they’re juicy, and sour, and its like fucking crack tbh

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite snack/food atm
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

I was riding my motorcycle down in Gulfport, MS when I saw a truck with a “Fresh Octopus” sign on it. I stopped and bought one just for shits and giggles. When I got home and realized that, alright I have an octopus, what should I do with it. I looked up some recipes online and decided to try it out. Oh how fun it was explaining to my mom why I have a 12lb octopus in the frying pan.

Read full topic

item.title: Favorite snack/food atm
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

It was a beautiful morning and I was strolling through the local park with my dog like I do every day when our gazes met eachother, I fell in love and couldnt bear my empty stomach thus I went to a butcher and ordered a pound.

Read full topic

Our eyes first met at the local grocery store. It was mid-morning and low on money, scouring the shelves for a tasty, warm and filling luncheon. 60c per packet seemed too good to be true, yet the necessary drink to return home with forced me to pick the cheapest option.

item.title: Favorite snack/food atm
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

That thing looks like a dog has just had birth on it multiple times, blood and bodily fluids saturate its surface. Although, the actual roll looks nice quite. May I ask why you’re even interested?

Though for me it would have to be a microwave based food, such as a rustler burger.

While they’re made of complete crap, they taste good

As for the back story, I was in a shop, the packaging grabbed my attention so I bought one.

Read full topic
